title: Speedball Testing
report: A while back I ordered some dimethocaine. There was not much info on this substance. So I decided to contribute. Preliminary tests proved that intranasally, this substance did feel a lot like cocaine. Mild euphoria and moderate stimulation. It was better than bad cocaine, but not as good as amazing coke.
I decided to see it would replace the speedball. I put the last 150 mgs in solution and added one bag of 'Overdose' brand heroin.
:30 seconds warm feelings, sense of stimulation
:01 realized that there was not going to be a rush or any audio flanging.
In conclusion, I feel that dimethocaine was interesting. But not altogether fulfilling. I'd do it again. But I wouldn't go out of my way to.

erowid.citation: Zenix M.. "Speedball Testing: experience with Heroin & Dimethocaine (ID 83031)". Erowid.org. Sep 6, 2011. erowid.org/exp/83031
